Iinkxaso-mali Zokufunda Izifundo Zezokhenketho




INKCAZELO:


1. Zeziphi Iinkxaso-mali Ezinikezelwa nguRhulumente wePhondo Kwicandelo Lezokhenketho?
2. Ziintoni Ezihlawulayo le Nkxaso-mali Yokufunda?
3. Ingaba kuya Kufuneka Ndiyibuyise okanye Ndisebenzele Ukuyibuyisa le Mali?
4. Ngubani Onokufaka Isicelo sale Nkxaso-mali Yokufunda?
5. Ndingasifaka Nnjani Isicelo?
6. Ndingalufumana Phi Olunye Ulwazi?




1. Zeziphi Iinkxaso-mali Ezinikezelwa nguRhulumente wePhondo Kwicandelo Lezokhenketho?


iSebe Lophuhliso Loqoqosho Nezokhenketho linikezela ngokuphangaleleyo iinkxaso-mali zokufunda ezimbini, kuxhomekeke ke ekubeni ziyadingeka na izakhono enikezelelwa zona loo nkxaso-mali kweli phondo. Ezi nkxaso-mali ke zezi:


* iDiploma Kulawulo Lwezokhenketho Nononophelo (eyidiploma ethabatha iminyaka emithathu eCape Peninsula University of Technology)
* Inkxaso-mali yaseBreedekloof Yezifundo Ngewayini & Nezokhenketho (esisidanga esithabatha iminyaka emihlanu kwiDyunivesithi yaseStellenbosch, nenikezelwa ngokubambisana namashishini abucala)





2. Ziintoni Ezihlawulayo le Nkxaso-mali Yokufunda?


Inkxaso-mali yaseteknkoni ihlawula izifundo, ngelixa kwiDyunivesithi yaseStellenbosch, le nkxaso-mali ihlawula izifundo, iincwadi, izixhobo, indawo yokuhlala nokutya.




3. Ingaba kuya Kufuneka Ndiyibuyise okanye Ndisebenzele Ukuyibuyisa le Mali?


Hayi. Ezi nkxaso-mali zyizizo ezo kufuneka uzibuyise ngokuphangela, yaye akukho nesenti ekufuneka uyibuyisile kuzo.




4. Ngubani Onokufaka Isicelo sale Nkxaso-mali Yokufunda?

Ukuze ube nokufaka isicelo senye yezi nkxaso-mali zokufunda kufuneka:

* ube ngummi woMzantsi Afrika okanye ke umhlali osisigxina kweli
* umhlali apha kwiNtshona Kapa
* ube uyakwazi ukubonakalisa ukuba ngokwenene uyayidinga le nkxaso-mali
* kungakunceda ke nokuthi kanti usuka kwenye yeengingqi ebezisa kuhleleleka
* ube wamkelwe kwiziko lemfundo onqwenela ukungena kulo



IMIYALELO:

Eli Sebe likhetha abafaki-zicelo kuluhlu lwabafundi ababhalisele ezo zifundo. Ngokwesiqhelo ke ukukhethwa kwaba bafaki-zicelo kwenziwa ngenyanga yoMdumba okanye yoKwindla yonyaka wokuqala wezi zifundo.

Ukuba ucinga ukuba uyamelana nale miqathango ingentla apha yokufumana le nkxaso-mali, qhagamshelana ne-ofisi ejongana neenkxaso-mali zokufunda yeziko lemfundo okulo.





6. Ndingalufumana Phi Olunye Ulwazi?
